author: ETMarkets.com
title: Stock market update: Stocks that hit 52-week lows on NSE
description: Bajaj Auto,  UPL,  Cipla,  HUL and  Nestle India were among the top losers on NSE.
content:
Stock market update: Stocks that hit 52-week lows on NSEETMarkets.comLast Updated: Dec 01, 2022, 10:39 AM ISTSynopsis Bajaj Auto,  UPL,  Cipla,  HUL and  Nestle India were among the top losers on NSE.Getty ImagesRetail and banking stocks rose 0.5 per cent and 0.7 per cent, respectively.NEW DELHI:  Luxuries Ltd., , ,  and  and others were among the stocks that touched their 52-week lows as of 10:39AM(IST)in Thursday's session. 
 
 Domestic benchmark index NSE Nifty gained 70.15 points to 18828.5, while the BSE Sensex traded 265.04 points up at 63364.69. 
 
 On the other hand, , HLV Ltd., ,  and  stocks hit their fresh 52-week highs today. 
 
 In the Nifty 50 index, , , TCS,  and  were among the top gainers on the NSE. 
, UPL, Cipla, HUL and  were among the top losers. 

Read More News on(What's moving Sensex and  Nifty  Track  latest market news,  stock tips and  expert advice on  ETMarkets.  Also, ETMarkets.com is now on Telegram. For fastest news alerts on financial markets, investment strategies and stocks alerts, subscribe to our Telegram feeds.) Download The Economic Times News App to get Daily Market Updates & Live Business News....moreless
